entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
